name: Pets Hair Salon
description: he crazy hair salon is back with Pets Real Haircuts. Stylish pets, fearsome pets or cute little domestic animals are trying to get their looks changed. Use your craziness to create original haircuts for dogs and cats. Eighteen colors, seven tools, a pet's hair and thousands of options to style your masterpiece. Cut it, trim it, curl it, color it, there are no bounderies, unleash your imagination and even a new cat or dog race may be borned in pets hair salon
